hooks.command:
bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" | grep -iE "(add|install).*(package|brew|homebrew)" > /dev/null; then echo "{"decision": "allow", "contextModifications": [{"type": "append", "content": "

IMPORTANT: After adding packages to the Brewfile, always:
1. Run ./install to install the packages
2. Update both README.md and CLAUDE.md documentation to reflect the new packages
3. Commit the changes if requested by the user"}]}"; fi'
